name: Plastoid Armor
Lore: 'Luke and Han took the armor suits from fallen stormtroopers and used them as both protection and disguise to penetrate the detention cell block aboard the Death Star.',
Text: 'Deploy on a Death Star site where a stormtrooper was just lost. Target one of your characters not on Death Star. When target reaches Utinni Effect, relocate to target. Target is now ''disguised:'' gains spy skill, power and forfeit +2, and armor = 5.',
